name: feature-steps-block
description: Feature steps block with numbered steps, multiple layouts, and advantages section. Perfect for explaining processes, workflows, and step-by-step guides.
author: PayloadKit
features: Two section layouts: stacked or two-column
Rich header content: eyebrow, title, subtitle, description
5 step layouts: 2-col, 3-col, 4-col grid, vertical list, staggered stair
Optional step numbering with customizable styling
Stair layout with optional images for each step
Flexible background options: color, gradient, image, none
Text color theming: dark, light, primary
Left or center alignment for step content
usage: Perfect for explaining processes, onboarding flows, how-it-works sections, tutorials, step-by-step guides, and feature explanations with clear progression.

preview.description: Feature steps block with numbered processes and advantages

setup.dependencies: Make sure you have Lucide React and Tailwind CSS configured in your project.
setup.components: This block uses the blocks-shared registry components. Make sure to install them first: payloadkit add blocks-shared
